choices: She carries on with her hike as though nothing happened
1.content:
Lilly woke up feeling refreshed that day. She looked at the clock, reading 7:45 in the morning. Why her body decided to be so energized was a mystery to her, seeing as how she usually sleeps until 10 or so, but she wasn't complaining. She hopped out of bed and waltzed downstairs to make herself a morning coffee and enjoy the sights of nature on her back porch like she usually does on her days off. Living in the country was more beneficial to her than living in a crowded city, she enjoyed the wide open space, the fresh air and the sounds of nature versus the sounds of the city.

At night, Lilly would DJ at a club for work. She was great at her job, she even got recognized by some of the top executives in the music industry. Usually she'd wear a somewhat revealing tank top and tight shorts with matching running shoes as she showed off her mad skills and sexy dance motions at the DJ booth. She also loved flaunting her long hair and skinny frame. This morning however, she went with a hoodie and some jogging pants as she cradled the coffee in her hands, watching the morning sun. It was nice watching the clouds and hearing the birds; it's like the sights and sounds of nature filled her with a zeal, an energy that told her body to just move.

After finishing her coffee, she put it down and spontaneously decided to go for a walk through the forest near her house. To get to the forest only took a 5 minute walk in itself, but she enjoyed rummaging through the trails that it had to offer. She knew that there were trails yet to be explored by her, so she thought it best to have a new adventure and seek out these unknown trails.

10 minutes go by and she's already deep in the thick part of the forest before she comes across a trail she believes she's never explored. "Let's do this" she says to herself as she heads down the mystery trail. A few more minutes of walking lead her to a crossroad in the forest. She can see the path open up as if someone has settled here previously, but from this "site" leads 4 other trails. She picks one at random, noting the one trail from which she came as she heads out further on her adventure.

But the sounds of nature seem to be getting to her. A slight feeling of fear, perhaps just a raised sense of awareness, has her hearing things in the forest that don't sound pleasant. She quickens her pace, but it isn't long before she discovers something she's never seen before. She sees a plant just off the trail, it kind of looks like it could be a large Venus fly trap... but she also had so many questions running through her brain.

What exactly is this thing?
Should she try to approach and investigate it?
Why does it seem to be the only plant of its kind out here?
Is it alien?
Should I try to run?
Have I had enough adventure for one day?
Did I turn the coffee pot off?

And then, something happens...
1.title: The beginning of Adventure

choices: "Just tickle me and get it over with!" (submission)
11.content:
She slowly moves forward, not knowing what to expect. She picks up a random stick from the ground and tries to poke at the plant. From what she can tell, it's a strong plant, but it does seem... fleshy, for lack of a better word. She analyzes it as she gets closer and closer. Soon enough, she's close enough to touch it with her own fingers, if she really wanted to do that. Some sort of smell seems to be radiating from the plant itself, but it's not an unpleasant one. She continues to look the plant over and notices that there is some sort of oily substance in what looks to be the mouth of the plant.

As she continues to analyze the plant, she feels something on her leg. She looks down to see that vines are moving, but before she can react or even think about what's going on, the vines suddenly seize both of her legs together, causing her to panic and try to fight.

"WHAT THE FUCK?!?" she yells. "HAAAALP!" Over and over she cries for help as her ankles are more engulfed in the vines, making it seem like escape is impossible. She tries to flail her arms everywhere, grabbing at anything that might help her get out, but they are quickly captured by the vines as well and firmly held in place.

"What is this? What's going on?" She questions to herself loudly. As if responding, the plant raises a couple loose vines and pokes her ribs a little.

"Hehe, what are you doing?" She thinks about how she is asking a plant and starts to question her own sanity. The vines then slither down to her feet, removing her shoes and socks with relative ease.

"Okay, Mr. Plant, what are you doing? I'm sorry if I entered the wrong forest, took the wrong path. Please just let me go." Lilly's voice starts to fluctuate like she is worried.

Lilly can feel slippery little feathers on her feet, which causes her to want to giggle, but she fights it off.

"What is happening?" She repeats over and over again as she tries so desperately to hold her composure. More feathers come to tickle her feet, making her break down in giggles. She tries to fight it and wiggle her legs free, but the vines are wrapped tight and they are strong. She can't do anything as she is held down on her knees and her hands held in the air. She can't fight the tickling feathers on her feet.

She starts to feel many more feathers on her body, mainly her belly and her armpits. With eyes wide, her laughter grows in volume as she is tickled by a living plant. The plant seems to lick its lips with multiple tongues as it controls all the vines on Lilly's body. Lilly starts to scream, but nothing seems to help as she is broken back down into laughter. As though reacting to the madness, Lilly decides to yell...
11.title: She approaches cautiously

13.content:
Amidst her multiple thoughts, she soon finds her clothes snagged on a couple of vines. She pulls herself free, but notices that the vines seem to be growing rapidly and they are moving up her clothes. Without a second thought, she tries to run out of there, but some vines are quick to grab her ankles and a wrist. The plant groans in response and shakes a little. She assumes the plant shook from excitement. But little is she aware that more vines are wrapping themselves around her wrists and ankles. She tries furiously to think of a plan, but can't think of anything besides...

info.description:
Welcome to my little rendition of tickling while on a hike. This story has to do mainly with tickling and related fetishes, so I ask that it be kept that way. Also, a minimum of 1000 characters per page is also preferred so as to be as descriptive as possible regarding actions, entities (people, animals, etc.) and other things. There may be things as nudity, drugs and other adult content, but I do ask that the story refrains from killing or abusing of any sort.

I do not take any credit for the artwork. This picture was made by MagicTickler on DeviantArt, so credit goes to that person for such an amazing piece. That person has a bunch of wonderful pieces, I suggested you go check all of them out on Deviant Art

Thank you and please enjoy :)
